title: Riot invested in Curse -
body:
I thought Curse merged with Liquid to make Team Liquid...

Who are Riot investing in lol.

replies.body:
Here's an [announcement](http://www.curseinc.com/news/64-riot-has-made-an-investment-in-curse) by Curse.

You can learn more about curse here - http://www.curseinc.com/company

Nice, i did not know this.

Solid pickup Kistorm, thanks for sharing man :)
